verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5212>Nisan<s%>, in the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, that <S%H3196>wine<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and I took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>. Now I had not been beforetime <S%H7451>sad<s%> in his <S%H6440>presence<s%>.

Wherefore the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Why is thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H7451>sad<s%>, seeing thou art not <S%H2470>sick<s%>? this is nothing else but <S%H7455>sorrow<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>. Then I was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: why should not my <S%H6440>countenance<s%> be <S%H3415>sad<s%>, when the <S%H5892>city<s%>, the <S%H1004>place<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%>, lieth <S%H2720>waste<s%>, and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof are <S%H398>consumed<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>?
Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, For what dost thou make <S%H1245>request<s%>? So I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, If it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and if thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> have found <S%H3190>favour<s%> in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%>, that thou wouldest <S%H7971>send<s%> me unto <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, unto the <S%H5892>city<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%>, that I may <S%H1129>build<s%> it.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, (the <S%H7694>queen<s%> also <S%H3427>sitting<s%> by <S%H681>him<s%>,) For how long shall thy <S%H4109>journey<s%> be? and when wilt thou <S%H7725>return<s%>? So it <S%H3190%H6440>pleased<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H7971>send<s%> me; and I <S%H5414>set<s%> him a <S%H2165>time<s%>.

Moreover I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, If it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, let <S%H107>letters<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> me to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>, that they may convey me <S%H5674>over<s%> till I <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H3063>Judah<s%>;

And a <S%H107>letter<s%> unto <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6508>forest<s%>, that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H6086>timber<s%> to make <S%H7136>beams<s%> for the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1002>palace<s%> which appertained to the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and for the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and for the <S%H1004>house<s%> that I shall enter <S%H935>into<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>granted<s%> me, according to the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%> upon me.

¶ Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H107>letters<s%>. Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> with me.

When <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite<s%>, and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%>, the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, it <S%H3415>grieved<s%> them <S%H7451%H1419>exceedingly<s%> that there was <S%H935>come<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H2896>welfare<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
So I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and was there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

¶ And I <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, I and <S%H4592>some<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with me; neither <S%H5046>told<s%> I any <S%H120>man<s%> what my <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: neither was there any <S%H929>beast<s%> with me, save the <S%H929>beast<s%> that I rode <S%H7392>upon<s%>.

And I went <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8577>dragon<s%> <S%H5869%H5886>well<s%>, and to the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>port<s%>, and <S%H7663%H7665>viewed<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, which were broken <S%H6555>down<s%>, and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof were <S%H398>consumed<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Then I went <S%H5674>on<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5869>fountain<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1295>pool<s%>: but there was no <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H929>beast<s%> that was under me to <S%H5674>pass<s%>.

Then went I <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook<s%>, and <S%H7663%H7665>viewed<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, and turned <S%H7725>back<s%>, and <S%H935>entered<s%> by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, and so <S%H7725>returned<s%>.

And the <S%H5461>rulers<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not whither I <S%H1980>went<s%>, or what I <S%H6213>did<s%>; neither had I as <S%H3651>yet<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> it to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, nor to the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, nor to the <S%H2715>nobles<s%>, nor to the <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, nor to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> I unto them, Ye <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>distress<s%> that we are in, how <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> lieth <S%H2720>waste<s%>, and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof are <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: <S%H3212>come<s%>, and let us build <S%H1129>up<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that we be no more a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.

Then I <S%H5046>told<s%> them of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%> which was <S%H2896>good<s%> upon me; as also the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> that he had <S%H559>spoken<s%> unto me. And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us rise <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%>. So they <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> for this <S%H2896>good<s%> work.

But when <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite<s%>, and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%>, the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%>, and <S%H1654>Geshem<s%> the <S%H6163>Arabian<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, they laughed us to <S%H3932>scorn<s%>, and <S%H959>despised<s%> us, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What is this <S%H1697>thing<s%> that ye <S%H6213>do<s%>? will ye <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%>?
